descriptions.help.en: A free-text account of the Dataset.

access_services.help.en: A site or end-point that gives access to the distribution of the dataset.

endpoint_urls.help.en: The root location or primary endpoint of the service (an IRI).

descriptions.help.en: A free-text account of the Distribution.

documentations.help.en: A page or document about this Distribution.

specifications.help.en: An established standard to which the distribution conforms.

title.help.en: A name given to the distribution.

access_urls.help.en: A URL that gives access to a Distribution of the Dataset.

byte_size.help.en: The size of a Distribution in bytes.

checksum.help.en: A mechanism that can be used to verify that the contents of a distribution have not changed.

conforms_to_schemas.help.en: An established standard to which the distribution conforms.

download_urls.help.en: A URL that is a direct link to a downloadable file in a given format.

format.help.en: The file format of the Distribution.

media_type.help.en: The media type of the distribution as defined by IANA

title.help.en: A name given to the distribution.

award_title.help.en: The human readable title or name of the award (grant).

funder_identifier_scheme_uri.help.en: The URI of the funder identifier scheme.

funding_program.help.en: Reference to the specific funding program.

local_identifier.help.en: The code assigned by the funder to a sponsored award (grant).

value.help.en: Value of the identifer within the given identifier scheme.

is_described_by.help.en: Inverse relation between dataset and metadata record.

date_created.help.en: The date on which the metadata record was created.

dates_updated.help.en: Date on which the resource was changed.

original_repositories.help.en: Link to the repository from which the metadata were originally stored and curated.
